title: Were the ancient Ionians related to or an extension of the Athenians? - Quora

response.answer_text: Athenians were part of the Ionian tribe which was part of one of four of the tribes which comprised the Greek race in ancient years (BC years). The other were Dorians, Aeolians, and Achaeans, A very well written article can be found of course in Wikipedia: Ionians - Wikipedia Explaining all about Athenians and their relations with Athenians.
